justification: The study utilized the 10-item Childhood Narcissism Scale (Thomaes et al., 2008) to measure leader narcissism, a well-validated method for assessing childhood narcissism as a unified and continuous personality trait.
The 10-item Rosenberg Self-Esteem Scale (Rosenberg, 1965) was employed to measure follower self-esteem, a well-validated unidimensional scale widely used to measure global self-esteem in children.
